Description:
Patch Management Specialist.Manage Patch Management for Servers (Windows and Linux)
Server patches also include Application and Databases
Coordinate with all stakeholders to apply patches
Submission of monthly management report on patch management health status
Depth Knowledge and Hands-on experience in ManageEngine Desktop Central Patch Management Tool.
Depth knowledge and hands-on experience in Patching techniques and processes (Risk Identification and mitigation) for Datacenter Virtualization Environment - VMWare, Hyper-V & Oracle OVM.
Depth Knowledge and hands-on experience in Patching techniques and processes (Risk Identification & Mitigation) for Linux Operating systems, and Windows server Operating systemsJob Details
